Banquets
Heron Creek Golf & Country Club offers the finest facility in the area. The Dining Room is available for wedding receptions, galas and gatherings at a limited capacity. The Private Dining Room can accommodate rehearsal dinners, small dinner parties, business meetings, and celebrations. The Board Room is also available for conferences and meetings. Please contact the Catering Director at
941-240-5100
for an appointment to discuss your needs.
Banquet Planner
Weddings
Every little girl dreams of her wedding day!  Heron Creek would be honored to help you make your dreams a reality.
Located in the heart of North Port, Heron Creek is the area’s best kept secret. Planning a large event, especially a wedding, can be a bit overwhelming at times. Whether you envision an intimate ceremony on the verandah or poolside ceremony, a formal or casual affair, our experienced staff can give you the freedom to simply sit back and enjoy your day.
Heron Creek has many fantastic photo opportunities  – around our beautiful clubhouses, on the championship golf course, or in the beauty of one of the natural areas found throughout the property. We also have the ability to host pre-wedding golf outings, rehearsal dinners, bridal showers, and more.
Wedding Planner
Winner of Sarasota's 16 best wedding venues. Heron Creek is featured at number 7.
Heron Creek’s dedicated staff looks forward to providing you and your guests with delicious food and impeccable service at a price to fit any budget.
Contact Sara Caselden for additional information or to book your event today!
Call 941-240-5100

Membership
The Heron Creek Golf & Country Club is presently organized as a privately-owned, semi-private golf and country club. The focal point of all social and golfing activity at Heron Creek is the 21,000 square foot, two-level Main Clubhouse at the end of Heron Creek Blvd. The Main Clubhouse contains the formal Top of the Green Main Dining Room, the more casual Heron's Roost Grille Room, the Golf Pro Shop, several meeting rooms, and administrative offices. The center-point of this extraordinary golf & country club is the 27-Hole championship golf course and world-class golf learning complex designed by highly noted architect, Arthur Hills. Also at the clubhouse complex are the state-of-the-art Fitness Center, with saunas and locker rooms; five lighted Har-Tru tennis courts and Tennis Pro Shop; and resort-style swimming pool with sun deck and spa.
Membership Brochure effective 7-1-2025
Membership Brochure
Email

[email protected]
Phone
: 941-240-5100
Membership Offerings
Memberships are available at Heron Creek Golf & Country Club. The membership program is documented in the current Membership Plan, copies of which are available from the Membership Director (see below). The following is a summary of the various types of memberships presently available.
Platinum Golf Membership
Unlimited use of all Club Facilities: Golf, Tennis, Fitness & Social    Activities.
1st Priority Placement on the Tee Sheet for our Arthur Hills 27-Hole Championship Golf Course.
Refundable Membership Initiation Deposit: $10,000
Non-refundable Membership Initiation Deposit: $5,000​
Monthly:
Dues:
Family
$728
Individual
$624
Executive Family (Age  21-54)
$527
Legacy Member (Age 76 and up)
$598
Yearly Food & Beverage Minimum*:
Family
$500
Individual/Executive/Legacy
$350
Optional Annual Trail
Fee:
Family
$3,150
Individual
or
$2,550
Daily Member Cart Fee
$37-18 Holes
Complimentary USGA Handicap and Discounted Member Guest Golf & Tennis Rates.
Silver Golf Membership
Unlimited use of the Club Facilities: (tennis, fitness & social activities), and have the following golf privileges:
24 Rounds in Season (November through April) and unlimited golf from May through October.
The fee for golf is our Associate Cart Fee of $42 per round.
2nd Priority Placement on the Tee Sheet for our Arthur Hills 27-Hole Championship Golf Course.
Nonrefundable Initiation Fee: $5,000
Monthly Dues: $406
Yearly Food & Beverage Minimum*: $350
Bronze Membership
Unlimited use of the Club facilities (tennis, fitness and social), and have the following golf privileges:
​24 times per year (12 of those in season, November through April) subject to course availability and applicable cart and green fees.
Ten day advance tennis court reservation privileges and reduced tennis guest fees.
Nonrefundable Initiation Fee: $5,000
Monthly Dues: $276
Yearly Food & Beverage Minimum*: $250
Seasonal Golf Membership
Unlimited use of all Club Facilities for 30, 60 or 90 consecutive days: Golf, Tennis, Fitness & Social Activities.
1st Priority Placement on the Tee Sheet for our Arthur Hills 27-Hole Championship Golf Course.
Dues 30 days - $1500 | 60 day - $2500 | 90 day - $3750
Food & Beverage Minimum:
$250
​Daily Member Cart Fee:
$32
Seasonal Bronze Membership
Unlimited use of all Fitness and Tennis Facilities and participation in all Tennis, Fitness and Club Social Activities for 30, 60 or 90 consecutive days.
​Priority 10-day advance tennis court reservation privileges and reduced tennis guest fees.
Limited Golf at the Guest of Member Rate.
Dues 30 day $500 | 60 day $800 | 90 day $1200
Food & Beverage Minimum:
$150
Corporate Membership
Corporate Memberships are available under all of the above categories of membership. Details are available from the Membership office.
For more information regarding Memberships, please contact the The Membership Office, at (941) 240-5100 or by Email to:
[email protected]
or fill out the form below.
Fees are subject to 7% Sales Tax and may be changed without notice.
*Prices effective July 1, 2025
*Includes activity from July 1 through June 30 of the following year.
